document.full_text: the philadelphia phillies celebrated a 5-4 victory, in 19 innings, over the cincinnati reds that ended early on thursday after an unlikely pitching debut by second baseman wilson valdez.
document.title: phillies win 19-inning marathon with unlikely pitcher
lines_and_colors: the philadelphia phillies celebrated a 5-4 victory, in 19 innings, over the cincinnati reds that ended early on thursday after an unlikely pitching debut by second baseman wilson valdez.
